metadata.name: Happiness
metadata.description:
One day I went outside to capture some scene and it was raining, there I saw a child holding an umbrella in one hand and a book in another, walking on a railway track and a spark or joy and pleasure can easily be seen through his face and hence this reminds me of "My Childhood" where we all are free to live and enjoy. So I stop, I look and i captured it. (This track is basically a Mughalpura railway track in railway Pakistan)      
This image won Sony World Photography Award 2017 ( National Award )

Body : Nikon D750
Lens : Nikon 70-200 F/2.8 Vr2
Dimension : 6016*4016
Location : Lahore, Pakistan
